author: Aletha Wilkinson
title: Controlling man s lessons rules for wife Dr Phil Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7
text:
Share Controlling man s lessons rules for wife Dr Phil Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7 
Sometimes, Dr Phil features people on his talk show who just don't seem like they can be helped. Bloke has crazy list of 'wife rules' UP NEXT 
And this couple, honestly, would be better off apart. Or rather, she'd be better off without him . This guy, ladies and gents. Source: Dr Phil 
Meet Josh and Rebecca, who appeared on Dr Phil to discuss the reasons Josh won't put a ring on it. He proposed to Rebecca a while back, but he refuses to marry her until she's fulfilled his extensive list of "wife lessons". His long-suffering fiancée, Rebecca. Source: Dr Phil 
To wit, Rebecca: 
-Must check in if goes anywhere-Wastes electricity doing hair-Can’t have sex unless he wants it-Can’t have allowance-Should have dinner ready and waiting-Should make grocery lists-Can’t see parents That is a looong list of 'lessons', Josh. Source: Dr Phil 
Oh, and Josh also took the air out of her car tyres when she tried to leave the house. Which means he... keeps her captive. This audience member was particularly unimpressed. Source: Dr Phil 
Bloody hell, Rebecca – run. Run as fast and as far as you can. Let us know if you need a safe place to stay. The couple sat with Dr Phil to go over their issues. Pretty sure it's just one: Josh is an ass. Source: Dr Phil Cash Dr. Phil Talking About That Viral Video, How Bow Dah? UP NEXT
